body.name: Bidet Attachment for Toilet, Ultra-Slim Non-Electric, Self Clean Bidet Sprayer, Adjustable Water Pressure, Dual Nozzle for Feminine/Posterior Wash, Easy to Install, White, BELLEARLY
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 35 mins
features: 🚽SELF CLEANING DUAL NOZZLE - Our bidet attachment for toilet, equipped with dual nozzles for rear and specialized feminine cleaning, with a simple rotary switch, you can easily switch between the two modes and can self clean.
🚽ADJUSTABLE WATER PRESSURE BIDET ATTACHMENT - Upgrade your toilet with this easy-to-install bidet attachment, providing adjustable water pressure for a refreshing and thorough cleaning experience.

🚽SUITABLE FOR OVER 95% OF TOILETS - This portable bidet can be applied to most existing toilets, the improved rim design ensures a perfect fit with most toilets, even for travel and RV toilets, ensuring that you never compromise on hygiene!

🚽SAFETY AND ECO-FRIENDLY - Say goodbye to traditional toilet paper and embrace the bidet attachment without electrocity, promoting better personal hygiene and reducing waste. And this toilet attachment is also leak-proof to avoid slipping accidents.

🚽EASY TO INSTALL & LONG WARRANTY - We have a comprehensive and easy to understand installation and operation manual, comes with an 18-month warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BELLEARLY Bidet Attachment for Toilet Seat Say goodbye to the traditional scrubbing with paper towels and use an innovative, comfortable and safe bidet for cleaning, which can also be used by pregnant mothers!

Everything Included Out of the Box Each BELLEARLY bidet comes with all the parts needed for installation. You will get: 1* braided hose, 1* brass T adapter connector, 2* rubber washer, 2* mounting plate, 1* teflon tape, 1* installation instruction paper.
Sprays a stronger water flow, angled towards your rear Sprays a softer water flow, angled towards your front Nozzles stay behind the guard gate when not in use, keeping them pristine

A barrier that keeps nozzles safe from unwanted splash back or debris Runs fresh water over nozzles to wash off unwanted debris The adjustment plate inserts rotate to fit most standard us toilet setups

Easy to Install and Use 1. Remove toilet seat. 2. Install the bidet on the toilet and adjust the position. 3. Connect water supply to bidet with fittings. *Warm reminder: Please turn off the water valve and empty the toilet tank before installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars simple powerful effective
reviews.reviewText: I must preface this review by saying that I am a bit of a fanatic when it comes to bidets. like if I met a friend and went to their home and they didn't have one in place, it might just be a deal breaker. like whether I needed to use it or not...that said, and having tried plenty of attachment-type bidets and some all in one solutions, I was slightlyskeptical about this bidet. but I just moved to a new place and my all in one solution has a steady that did not fit. so I tried this and was more than pleasantly surprised. the instructions were very easy to follow and the whole thing was on, connected, adjusted to fit and doing it's thing in no time. it has a powerful spray from both nozzles. I have nothing negative to say about any of it... especially for the price. highly recommend for both newbies and those already comfortable with a clean bum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gets The Job Done
reviews.reviewText: The directions failed to mention the oddly shaped washer or how to install it. We ended up putting it cone-side down. It seems to be working, so we'll call it good. It was very easy to install. It's not high-end... kind of more rear-end, but it offers a very cleansing stream. I mean, this thing will power-wash your... you know. You will only need toilet paper to dry everything off.The one other issue I see with it is that for those with a larger backside, the control arm may be a bit close for comfort as it lovingly strokes your outer right thigh as you're doing your business.Oh - and don't try turning it on if you're not sitting on it. I admit to having a blonde moment wondering if I could get a photo of the little water arm and managed to hose down a towel hanging on a rack on the opposite wall. I was secretly thankful it hit the towel and not the wall itself. Hoping it will dry off before my son showers in the morning.*looks around innocently*

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ho Hum for the Bum
reviews.reviewText: I have prior experience with using a cold water bidet, so I will use that experience to evaluate this bellearly Bidet Attachment for Toilet.This is about as basic as you can get. It is very thin, which aids in low clearance for the toilet seat, but in the same respect, it also feels somewhat flimsy.The sprayer is very low profile and fits right back against the bowl rim so it is out of the way. You can get about 1/4" of adjustment back and forth to push it a little forward before locking the screws down on the seat. Here-in 'lies' the problems (or 'sits' in this case)..I have an oval bowl and seat. I found that as an average sized male I needed to sit way back on the seat for the bum wash. It was easier to use the feminine frontal wash for the bum instead.The Amazon posting shows 2 rubber washers come with this kit - one for the top of the adapter and 1 for the bottom. My kit only had 1 rubber washer. In the instruction manual they make no mention of those rubber washers or where they go . Having experience with installing plumbing fixtures, I knew where it goes, but other customers may not.Another feature I don't like is that there is not a very solid 'click-stop' when turning the knob to the off position (it does click, but it turns very loosely). This means you will often-times be needing to look at the knob to make sure it is in the off position when done using.I'm just not very impressed with this bidet.
